Flow.description: JRS - updated associated from "Pre-Application Meeting Submittal" to "Pre-Application Conference"
Flow.label: (Application Flow) Site Plan

fields.name: Record_Name_Header
fields.fieldText: New {!Record_Type_Name_Header} Application

fields.name: Project_Details_Display
fields.fieldText:
Project Details

Provide us with additional details about the project by filling in the details below.

fields.name: DT_Placeholder
fields.fieldText: Placeholder link for UDO/application requirements/additional information

fields.name: Has_a_Pre_Application_Meeting_Been_Held
fields.fieldText: Has a Pre-Application Meeting Been Held?

fields.name: PreApplication_Mandatory_Display
fields.fieldText: A pre-application Meeting is mandatory.

fields.name: Does_this_project_generate_100_or_more_peak_hour_trips_or_1000_or_more_trips_per
fields.fieldText: Does this project generate 100 or more peak hour trips or 1000 or more trips per day?

fields.name: Display_Text_TIA_No_SP
fields.fieldText: A traffic assessment is required. Please make sure this is ready to upload on the next page of the application.

fields.name: Is_this_a_Modification_to_an_Approved_Site_Plan
fields.fieldText: Is this a Modification to an Approved Site Plan?

fields.name: Is_this_a_Major_or_Minor_Modification
fields.fieldText: Is this a Major or Minor Modification?

fields.name: Is_the_applicant_the_owner
fields.fieldText: Are you the owner of all parcels/addresses included on the application?

fields.name: Does_the_Project_Change_or_Extend_Public_Infrastructure
fields.fieldText: Does the Project Change or Extend Public Infrastructure?

fields.name: Is_the_Project_Part_of_a_Conditional_Zoning_District
fields.fieldText: Is the Project Part of a Conditional Zoning District?

fields.name: Is_the_Project_Part_of_a_Development_with_a_Special_Use_Permit
fields.fieldText: Is the Project Part of a Development with a Special Use Permit?

fields.name: Is_the_project_within_a_Planned_Development
fields.fieldText: Is the project within a Planned Development?

fields.name: Is_the_Project_within_an_Overlay_District
fields.fieldText: Is the Project within an Overlay District?

fields.fieldText: Provide detailed information concerning all requests.
